sections.heading: of taxes, personal; false return; damages
sections.text: For knowingly making a false return, the officer shall be liable for double the amount of taxes, with interest and costs, to be recovered in the name of the county.SourceLaws 1903, c. 73, ยง 155, p. 444;Laws 1911, c. 106, ยง 1, p. 385;R.S.1913, ยง 6484;C.S.1922
